titleStmt.title: A new complaint of an old grievance, made by Lievt. Col. Iohn Lilburne, prerogative prisoner in the Tower of London. Nove. 23. 1647. To every individuall member of the Honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
